search.query: sourcetype=capture | dedup source | rex field=source "\S*\/(?<shortSource>[^\)].*)" | table shortSource | sort shortSource

$source_token$ | dedup dst_fqdn | eval threat_category=if(threat_category="","",split(threat_category,",")) | mvexpand threat_category | eval threat_category=if(threat_category=$threat_category_token$,$threat_category_token$,0) | sort threat_category desc | dedup dst_fqdn | rename threat_category as threat_id | join threat_id [search sourcetype=list source="*threat_types.csv" | rename id as threat_id, category as threat_category] | table dst_latitude, dst_longitude, threat_category | geostats count by threat_category latfield=dst_latitude longfield=dst_longitude

map.option: {"no threat": #2BC3FF, "threat type unspecified": #FF2850, "malware": #FF2850, "social engineering": #FF2850, "unwanted software": #FF2850, "potentially harmful application": #FF2850}

search.query: $source_token$ | rename dst_latitude as latitude, dst_longitude as longitude | search latitude>=$lat_min$ latitude<$lat_max$ longitude>=$long_min$ longitude<$long_max$ | dedup dst_fqdn | eval threat_category=if(threat_category="","",split(threat_category,",")) | mvexpand threat_category | eval threat_category=if(threat_category=$threat_category_token$,$threat_category_token$,0) | sort threat_category desc | dedup dst_fqdn | rename threat_category as threat_id | where threat_id != 0 | join threat_id [search sourcetype=list source="*threat_types.csv" | rename id as threat_id, category as threat_category] | rename dst_query_name as "DNS Query", dst_fqdn as "Reverse Lookup", threat_category as "Threat Category" | table DNS_Query, Reverse_Lookup, "Threat Category"
